Title: Relates to increasing the mandatory retirement age of New York state regional park police
Summary: Relates to increasing the mandatory retirement age of New York state regional park police from 62 to 65 years old.
LawSection: Parks, Recreation and Historic Preservation Law
LawCode: Amd ยง13.17, Pks & Rec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the parks, recreation and historic preservation law, in relation to increasing the mandatory retirement age of New York state regional park police
